description: St. Patrick's Day is right around the corner, and we can't think of a better way to&nbsp;celebrate than with an Irish Buck cocktail!This mix featuring whiskey,&nbsp;ginger ale, lime juice will make you feel like you’re in Ireland as soon as it hits your tongue. So be sure to add this amazing drink to your list for cocktails on March 17th so that everyone has something unique they enjoy during their party or event celebration.
name: Irish Buck
recipeIngredient: ¼ oz. Lime juice, freshly squeezed

recipeInstructions.name: Add the whiskey and lime juice into a Collins glass filled with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Add the whiskey and lime juice into a Collins glass filled with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Top with the ginger ale and stir gently and briefly to combine.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with a lime wheel. Serve.
